model.name: country
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Transactions ( transactionId string PRIMARY KEY, transactionIdentifier varchar(200), transactionIdentifierType varchar(200), organization varchar(200) ) AS SELECT name, alpha2_code,alpha3_code FROM (EXEC ws.invokeHttp(action=>'GET', endpoint=>'/tx/CanonicalTransactionData?tid=1', stream=>'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/root/RestResponse/result' PASSING JSONTOXML('root', f.result) COLUMNS transactionId string PATH 'transactionId/text()', transactionIdentifier string PATH 'transactionIdentifier/text()', transactionIdentifierType string PATH 'transactionIdentifierType/text()', organization string PATH 'organization/text()') AS A;
